Moeez Omair Documentation
=========================

Welcome to the documentation for the MC ODE Solver project!

This project aims to provide a library for solving ordinary differential equations (ODEs) using Monte Carlo methods, including both linear and nonlinear ODEs. The library includes various solvers, benchmarks, and visualization tools.

Contents
---------
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   introduction
   usage
   api
   benchmarks
   tests
